ergonomic_products.name: Lumbar Support Cushion
ergonomic_products.description: Provides firm support to the lower back, preventing the spine from collapsing into a C-shape when sitting on sofas, chairs, or in cars. Reduces lumbar disc pressure and promotes upright posture.

ergonomic_products.name: Adjustable Laptop Stand
ergonomic_products.description: Raises laptop to eye level, reducing neck flexion and forward head posture in bed, sofa, desk, and floor setups. Minimizes neck strain and upper-back rounding.

ergonomic_products.name: Phone/Tablet Bed Stand
ergonomic_products.description: Holds device at eye height, eliminating the need to look down sharply and preventing neck flexion and shoulder tension during bed or sofa use.

ergonomic_products.name: Lap Desk With Cushion Base
ergonomic_products.description: Provides a stable elevated surface for laptop or books while sitting on sofa or bed, reducing slouching, neck strain, and unsupported wrist angles.

ergonomic_products.name: Ergonomic Seat Cushion (Firm Foam)
ergonomic_products.description: Elevates hips and reduces pelvis backward-rolling when sitting on soft surfaces or floor. Helps maintain neutral spine alignment and reduces lower back pain.

ergonomic_products.name: Footrest (Adjustable)
ergonomic_products.description: Keeps feet flat and supported in sofa setups, at desks, or for elderly sitting. Improves hip/knee alignment and prevents lower-back strain from dangling legs.

ergonomic_products.name: Wrist Support Pillow (for phone/computer use)
ergonomic_products.description: Supports elbows/forearms while holding devices or typing, preventing shoulder elevation and reducing wrist strain.

ergonomic_products.name: Reading Book Stand (Adjustable Angle)
ergonomic_products.description: Lifts books to eye level, decreasing neck flexion and upper-back slouching while studying in bed or on floor.

ergonomic_products.name: Memory Foam Neck Pillow (Firm, Contoured)
ergonomic_products.description: Maintains neutral neck alignment when semi-reclining or watching TV in bed. Prevents chin-tilt and cervical discomfort.

ergonomic_products.name: Ergonomic Gaming Chair
ergonomic_products.description: Provides full back and lumbar support, encouraging upright seated posture during long gaming sessions. Reduces neck/shoulder strain from leaning forward.

ergonomic_products.name: Monitor Riser / Stackable Riser Blocks
ergonomic_products.description: Raises screen height on desks, consoles, or gaming setups to minimize forward head posture and slumping.

ergonomic_products.name: Anti-Fatigue Standing Mat
ergonomic_products.description: Reduces leg and lower-back fatigue during kitchen prep, dishwashing, ironing, or standing tasks by improving load distribution in the feet and legs.

ergonomic_products.name: Knee Support Pad (for cleaning floor-level surfaces)
ergonomic_products.description: Protects knees from pressure and helps maintain safer kneeling posture during chores, reducing knee strain.

ergonomic_products.name: Ergonomic Steering Cushion
ergonomic_products.description: Provides lumbar and pelvic support in cars, reducing slouching and promoting upright, stable driving posture.

ergonomic_products.name: Portable Backrest Support (Rigid + Cushion Combo)
ergonomic_products.description: For sitting on floor, bed, or non-backed chairs. Provides instant spine support to avoid slouching and maintain lumbar curve.

ergonomic_products.name: Adjustable LED Task Light
ergonomic_products.description: Reduces the need to lean forward or crane neck when reading or working, especially for elders. Prevents forward head posture and eye strain.

ergonomic_products.name: Posture-Correction Strap (Soft Elastic Chest Band)
ergonomic_products.description: Gently retracts shoulders and promotes upright torso alignment, useful for habitual hunching during phone/laptop use.

ergonomic_products.name: Phone Grip / PopSocket
ergonomic_products.description: Reduces wrist and finger strain during prolonged phone use and helps maintain neutral wrist angles.

ergonomic_products.name: Laptop External Keyboard + Mouse Kit
ergonomic_products.description: Allows laptop screen to remain elevated on stand while keeping hands in neutral position. Reduces neck, shoulder, and wrist strain.

ergonomic_products.name: Ergonomic Pillow Wedge (Back Support Wedge)
ergonomic_products.description: Supports the entire trunk at a proper angle when reclining in bed for TV or study, reducing neck flexion and lumbar slouching.
